entry.title: Lychee Peachy Milk
entry.ingredients: Whole lychee or 1/2 cup lychee juice 1 cup peaches, sliced (2 medium) 1 1/2 - 2 cups milk of choice (depending on how much peach flavour you want)
entry.instructions: Place the peaches and the sugar in a small food processor and process until broken down. Pour into a small pot and bring to a boil on medium-high heat. Once the mixture comes to a boil, remove from heat. Transfer into a small bowl and refrigerate 1 hour to cool. Meanwhile, skin and deseed lychee if using fresh. Add the milk and peach mixture and lychee to a high powered blender and blend until combined. Serve immediately.
